variables.name: Inlet concentration of A
variables.description: Molar concentration of reactant A in the feed entering the reactor.

variables.name: Reaction rate constant of first reaction
variables.description: First-order rate constant for the conversion of A to intermediate B.

variables.name: Reaction rate constant of second reaction
variables.description: First-order rate constant for the conversion of intermediate B to product C.

variables.name: Residence time
variables.description: Mean residence time of fluid elements in the reactor, defined as reactor volume divided by volumetric flow rate.

variables.name: Reactor volume
variables.description: Volume of the continuous stirred tank reactor.

variables.name: Volumetric flow rate
variables.description: Volumetric flow rate of the feed stream into the reactor.

variables.name: Reaction rate of first step
variables.description: Rate of the first irreversible first-order reaction consuming A (A → B).

variables.name: Reaction rate of second step
variables.description: Rate of the second irreversible first-order reaction consuming B (B → C).

variables.name: Steady-state concentration of A
variables.description: Molar concentration of species A in the reactor at steady state.

variables.name: Steady-state concentration of B
variables.description: Molar concentration of intermediate species B in the reactor at steady state.

variables.name: Steady-state concentration of C
variables.description: Molar concentration of product species C in the reactor at steady state.

variables.name: Inlet concentration of B
variables.description: Molar concentration of B in the feed entering the reactor (set to zero in this study).

variables.name: Inlet concentration of C
variables.description: Molar concentration of C in the feed entering the reactor (set to zero in this study).
